text:
@InterMiamiCF When? Recently? Like just after training for the @MLS is Back tournament? Or was this from several weeks ago?
We need more details! We are OWED details! How can I make plans to be in Orlando on July 8th if there’s a chance the season doesn’t even get that far because of #Covid19
